He was even wearing his formal shoes, which he said he'd never put on. "Um, Jack, sweetie. What are you...?"
"You were supposed to take me and Mary to the park today", Jack whined. "You didn't forget, did you?"
"Oh! That's right", you said. You felt terrible. Not only did you forget about your commitment to your son, but you were going to have to tell him that his little date would have to be cancelled. You couldn't go out in your condition. "Jack, sweetie... I'm afraid we'll have to..."
The boy looked up at you as he waited for you to finish. You could already imagine how upset he would be once you told him that the little date he had planned and put so much effort into wasn't going to happen because you weren't feeling well.
No. You couldn't possibly do that to your son. Not with him looking forward to this. "I'm afraid... We might be a little late!", you said. "I'm so sorry I slept for so long!"
"Oh, uh, alright", Jack said. "We better hurry, then."
You run to your room and quickly slip into a pair of grey sweatpants and a purple tank top and slipped on a pair of white running shoes before heading out. If you had to go, you figured that you could at least get some exercise in. You set your son in his seat and headed off to pick up Mary. The little girl was dressed in a cute pink and white frilly dress and a pair of clean red shoes. As she ran over to meet up with Jack, you got a chance to talk with Tina for a bit. "Don't they look adorable?", she said as the two children stood and talked to each other.

"They do, don't they?", you said. "My little Jackie's been planning this for over a week", you said with more than a bit of motherly pride.

Tina chuckled as she saw Jack open the door for her daughter. "He's quite the little gentleman", she said before sniffing the air. "Is that... butterscotch?"

"That's, er... the pie I baked for the picnic", you said uncomfortably.

"Oh. Well it smells delicious."

You soon waved your friend goodbye and drove off to the park.

"Miss Harper", Mary said. "What's that yummy smell?"

"That's, uh... Oh look, we're here!"

You quickly found a parking spot and got out, with Jack wasting little time to impress his little girlfriend. "After you, my dear", Jack said as he opened the door for Mary.

The girl giggled and hopped out of the seat. "Thank you, mister Harper", she said, bending over to give Jack a big kiss on the cheek. You smiled as the two children giggled, running off to set up their picnic.

You felt that Jack was safe with Mary, so you began running around the park. There wasn't a track or anything. Just a long pathway where the grass was shorter. You wish the city wasn't so cheap, but you had to admit that it was softer than concrete.

As you ran, you couldn't help but keep looking over to Jack and Mary. You were certain that they were alright, but a nagging feeling in the back of your head kept telling you to go back and keep an eye on them, even if you ended up ruining their alone time. There was nothing else for it at this point. Jack was your only hope for getting back to safety. You knew that your body would eventually reform, but it would surely take a very long time. Even then, you would need to be in a safe and secure location during the reformation process, or even the simple act of a book falling on you would crush you flat and undo all of your progress.

Thankfully, the grass was relatively clean cut in the park, and only came up to your waist. After gathering your thoughts, you began to sprint like mad through the grassy field, knowing that it would take much longer than it usually would to reach your son. A half mile wouldn’t normally take longer than five minutes at the most, but at your drastically diminished size, five minutes could easily stretch to an hour.

It turned out that your estimate was correct. A full hour passed before you finally stumbled onto the large blanket that Jack and Mary were having their picnic on. You collapsed onto the blanket, wanting to catch your breath before approaching the children. You had run non-stop for the full hour, and your chest felt just about ready to burst.

It had been one of the hardest runs of your entire life. The waist high grass really slowed you down, and you had to dive for cover or sprint like mad several times in order to save your life. You were almost stepped on nearly fifteen times, a car almost drove over you once, and a four-year-old little girl toddled after you for thirty feet yelling “Dolly! Dolly!” until her mother finally picked her up. Other than the little girl though, no one had spotted you.

“What do we have here?” You heard an all too familiar childish voice ask aloud. Before you could even move, a giant hand wrapped around your chest and lifted you into the air. The hand was petite and smooth, no doubt belonging to a young child. Sure enough, the hand belonged to Mary, who had discovered your presence. After all, you had stumbled onto her blanket, and she had been sitting there the whole time. You merely had failed to notice her in your exhausted state.

As Mary lifted you up to her face to examine you closer, you were absolutely terrified at the sheer scale of her. She was a giantess, practically a goddess to you. She had total control over your body with just one hand. Her cute little face smiled brightly as she looked over your now doll sized body, and you found yourself unable to say a word. You could only tremble in fear.

Mary began tilting you to examine you from every angle, and it was then you realized your horrible mistake. Mary’s thumb crushed your mouth shut, your gummy lips squeezed together by immense pressure. By the time Mary’s thumb moved into a different position, your mouth was sealed as tight as could be. Preventing you from speaking or making any noises at all. You were effectively mute, which made the entire situation you were in much, much worse.

Mary tossed and turned you between her hands, her boundless curiosity egging her on to investigate every inch of your body. Mary smiled down at you, her eyes twinkling with an expression that would normally fill you with glee. Now it only filled you with terror.

“You’re a cute little dolly.” Mary giggled. “I’m gonna take you home with me, and dress you up all pretty, and give you a lot of makeup. Okay?” You tried to sit up and make any signs of protest, but your body was too sore and beaten. Thinking of you as nothing but a simple doll, Mary zipped up her purse, casting you into total darkness.

Tears streamed down your face as you continued to lie in Mary’s purse. Your brain was struggling to realize the full severity of your situation. Without anyone around, who would take care of Jack? How would you ever convince Mary you weren’t just a simple dolly for her to play with? How would you ever get back to your normal size? Were you destined to be a dolly for the rest of your life, nothing but a little girl’s plaything?

These questions and more raced through your head for the next two hours. Jack and Mary had long since finished their picnic, and were waiting for you to show up and take them home. Finally, the kids realized that something had happened to you. Mary called Tina on her cell phone (a kiddie phone only able to call Tina and the police), and Tina rushed over to the park. 11422111.content:
You had endured three days as Mary's little doll, silently having to sit through tea parties, little pretend vacations, and being "saved" by a knight doll while being stripped and squeezed into several constructing outfits. You had only caught brief glimpses of your son while his little girlfriend played with you. Jack seemed to be very upset and hardly ate, but Mary seemed to make his mood brighten. Even her twin brother, who was normally rude to Jack, seemed to be getting along with him (probably because of your supposed disappearance). You wanted desperately to yell out and tell him you were alright, but the glue-like gloss on your lips prevented any noise. Today, though, the gloss seemed to have gotten brittle and was starting to crack.

"But Mommy!", Mary whined as she followed Tina, carrying you to the living room along with several other toys. "You promised you would play with me today!"

"I know, sweetheart, but I thought Jack's mother would have turned up by now", Tina said as she was heading out the door. "Me and miss Barbara are going to make some fliers. See if Jackie can play with you."

"Gary's trying to get him to play some dumb video game", Mary pouted. "No one wants to play with me...", the little girl said, hanging her head low as she began to walk back to her room.

Tina paused just before she exited her house. "... I think I have time to play for a little bit", Tina said.

Mary quickly perked up and ran back to the living room, grabbing her mother's hand and running into the living room. "Yay! Here, you pick a dolly and I'll go get the castle", the girl said, setting her toys down and running off to her room.

Tina giggled and looked over her daughter's toys before grabbing you. "This looks like a cute little doll. Almost looks familiar..."

Now that you were in Tina's hands, you saw your opportunity to get her attention, wriggling your arms as much as you could in this constricting dress and trying to scream out.

"What in the world?", Tina said as she saw your faint movements. "It's... moving?"

"She noticed me!", you thought. You tried to open your lips and call out to her, giving her a sign that you were alive. Finally, the brittle, sparkly lip gloss finally cracked open, allowing you to speak for the first time in several days. "TIIIIINNNNAAAA!"

Tina quickly jumped back and dropped you out of shock. "Wh-what the hell?!"

"Tina! It's me, Trish!", you called out from your place on the floor.

"Trish?! N-no, it couldn't be..." Tina reached over and grabbed you, looking down at the doll claiming to be her lost friend.

"I've, uh, got a bit of explaining to do..."
============================================

You told her about what had happened and where you had been for the past few days. First, about the illness your son had given you, and how you ran out of your medication, then your incident with the lawnmower, and finally, the time you spent as one of Mary's dolls. Tina found it difficult to believe, but she didn't see any reason to doubt you. She undressed you and got you a less constricting dress to wear and called the kids into the living room to tell them about your incident.

Jack didn't even seem to process the knowledge that you were just like him. The second you opened your mouth to talk to him, he grabbed you out of Tina's hand and hugged you tightly, squishing you a bit as tears ran down his cheeks. "Momma... *sniff* I thought I'd never see you again..." He had spent these past few days thinking you were kidnapped or had run off and had missed you so much, you could see the happiness radiating from him now that he saw that you were (mostly) safe.

You grunted a bit as you squeezed yourself up. "I'm happy to see you, too, Jackie", you said, giving your son a kiss on the forehead.

"Does this mean Jack can't be my little brother anymore?", Gary asked.

Tina thought for a moment. She had enough trouble looking after Jack for the few days she thought you were missing. Making sure both of you were safe would be even more of a hassle. "Maybe I ought to ask Barb for advice...", she thought to herself. "We'll see", Tina said.

You explained to Tina that Barbara knew about your condition, and the two of you agreed that she and Barbara ought to decide what would be done with you and Jack for the time being. As much as you wanted a say in the matter, it would be a major inconvenience to whoever would be watching over both you and your son, so you understood. Tina called Barbara and headed into the kitchen to tell her about your situation while the kids played. "Come on, Jack", Gary said. "We gotta go finish our game."

"But my momma..." Jack turned to you as you sighed.

"I'll be fine, Jackie. You go and play", you said.

Jack nodded and gave you a quick hug before setting you down on the coffee table, leaving you alone with Mary. Almost as soon as Jack left, Mary picked you up and held you to her face. "So... I guess Jackie can't live with us anymore..."

"Well, I'm not sure, Mary", you answered. "It depends on what your mother and Miss Barbara decide. Maybe we'll be living with you for a little while longer, maybe we'll be leaving today."

"But I want him to stay", Mary said. "I love him so much. And he loves me. That means we're supposed to stay together, right?", she said, tightening her grip on you.

You had begun to grow scared. This is the same little girl that had kept you prisoner for the past few days. In your current state, she could splatter you in her hands with almost no effort. "Mary...", you said calmly, trying not to anger the young giantess holding you, "I know how much you care about him, but he's my son. He needs me to be there for..."

"No he doesn't!", Mary cried. "I'm the only one he needs! You just want to take him away from me like you always do!" Mary then began tightening her grip, now squishing you tightly in her fist. "He's my Jackie and no one else's!"

"*urk!* Mary, please!", you called out. "I know you love Jack, but I love him, too!" You struggled in vain as you attempted to reason with Mary. Looking up at her, you saw her cute face burning with jealousy, appearing like a angry little goddess to you. "I understand you like having Jack living with you! But I need to be there for him, too. I need my son. Please, I need you to understand."

Mary looked down at you for a moment, thinking about how she was going to respond.

115.content:
You finally remembered that the cooler contained a small chunk of Jack’s gummy body. After a bit of persuading, he had allowed you to cut off a small slice, in exchange for you buying him a new video game. Of course, part of your own body would’ve worked, but you were trying your hardest to keep your secret under wraps.

Grabbing the cooler, you headed out the door and climbed into your car. There was a research lab about an hour away from your house, so that’s where you headed. It was an uneventful drive, and you soon found yourself pulling into an empty parking space and heading inside.

The lab was huge from the outside, and a complex maze of white corridors and endless doors inside. Multitudes of doctors and assistants scurried around the hallways, not even sparing you a glance. They all had their heads buried in books and data pads. It was like something out of a science fiction movie.

“Hello? May I help you?” A feminine voice called. It was the receptionist, seated behind a large desk.

“Yes, I’m Trish Harper. I called about donating a sample?” You explained, and the receptionist nodded.

“Right. Of course. Follow me.” The receptionist stood up, and you followed her through the lab. Down one hallway, turn, another hall, turn, turn, two more hallways. It never seemed to end. Finally, she brought you to a small, empty office.

“Wait here for Doctor Julia, please. If you’d like, you can insert your sample into the machine on the desk. The machine will automatically absorb the substance, and begin testing its’ properties. Thank you.” The receptionist bowed politely, and then left, closing the door behind her.

You looked around the room for a few minutes, but there wasn’t much to see. Just two cabinets, a desk, and an odd-looking machine. This was the machine the receptionist had pointed out to you. It was a complicated-looking mess of tubes and wires, with a big, transparent cylinder in the center. Underneath the cylinder was a tiny, empty vial.

You opened up your red cooler, which only contained a small plastic bottle. Inside the bottle was a small lump of tan gummy, a piece of Jack. You bent down in front of the machine, and began twisting off the cap on the bottle.

What happens next?

1152.content:
As you were about to finish popping off the cap on the bottle, the bottle slipped between your fingers. Your hands had begun to sweat profusely, and the plastic bottle slipped free and fell to the floor. The bottle bounced off of your foot and rolled underneath the desk, disappearing into the shadows.

Sighing, you bent down to look under the desk, placing your hands on the desk to brace yourself. As you did so, your thumb pressed onto the absorption plate of the strange machine, and a loud whirring noise kicked to life. Lights began to flash on the machine, and you felt a light tug on your thumb.

In an instantaneous moment, the light tug turned into a full vacuum, and your thumb was squished and sucked into the machine. The rest of your hand soon followed, and the machine quickly began to compress and absorb your arm. Your screams of panic were drowned out by the machine’s noises, as the mechanical menace proceeded to eat up your gummy body.

Your cries of fear and terror were abruptly cut off as your head was crushed and mangled, sucked into the entrance tube of the machine. Your body was lifted into the air as the high-pressure vacuum machine continued to pull your body inside of it. Soon, only your legs were left.

Your legs kicked and flailed reflexively, and you ended up kicking off the heels you had been wearing. The heels fell right down into the open red cooler, knocking it over onto its’ side. The cooler lid slammed shut, locking into place.

Your legs were finally sucked into the machine, and your entire body was spun around through various tubes, before finally coming to a stop in the central cylinder. Your clothes had been shredded to microscopic bits, and you were left as a tan lump of gummy resting at the bottom of the cylinder.

You wiggled and wobbled as much as you possibly could, barely making any movement at all. You focused fully on reforming, but you didn’t make much progress. It was hard to focus, as your brain was going a mile a minute. You were mentally sobbing, and fighting back the urge to faint from shock.

At that moment, everything became ten times worse. The door to the office swung open, and two women walked inside. The first woman was a curvy, black-haired woman of thirty with glasses. The blonde girl behind her looked like she was still in high school, though she wasn’t any less attractive.

“Oh. Where did Miss Harper go?” The black-haired woman mused.

“I’m not sure Doctor Julia.” The younger girl replied. “It looks like the sample has been inserted into the machine however.” She pointed to your quivering body.

“Indeed.” Julia nodded, but frowned when she saw the red cooler lying on the ground. “I don’t know what that is though. Throw it away, would you Harley?”

“Certainly ma’am.” Harley, the younger girl, scooped up your red cooler and tossed it into a large trash can in the corner of the room. Julia sat down at her desk, and read through the machine’s analysis of your body. Her eyes lit up with excitement.

“My goodness! The properties of this strange substance are…incredible!” Julia laughed. “I’ve never seen anything like it! We must get this tested immediately!” With the press of a button, the machine squeezed and compacted your body, shoving you down into the tiny, empty vial. Your gummy body filled the vial to the brim, making it impossible for you to reform or move at all.

Harley picked up the vial, and gently placed you in Doctor Julia’s hands. As the two women smiled down at you, blissfully unaware that they were holding a human being in their hands, you could only weep in agony. What had you done to deserve this horrible, cruel fate?

124.content:
You sighed loudly, lost in thought about pondering what on earth you should spend your time doing today. Your loud sighs actually caught the attention of your maid, who had just entered the house. She walked upstairs and knocked politely on your door before coming in. She sauntered over to right beside you on the bed, and glanced down at you lying there.

“Is anything the matter Miss Harper?” The maid asked politely. Her name was Barbara, but everyone called her Barbie to avoid any confusion between her and your good friend. She had long blonde hair that was usually tied back into a long ponytail dropping almost all the way down to her butt, and a cute face. Speaking of her butt, Barbie was an extremely curvy girl, who somehow managed to squeeze it all away into a very tight and revealing maid’s uniform.

The biggest downside to Barbie was that she was one of the ditziest and most air-headed girls Trish had ever met. She would forget a direction seconds after being told, and she misplaced anything that was given to her. She was also prone to tripping, dropping fragile objects, and falling down the stairs. Despite all of her flaws, she was an excellent maid when it really came to it, and she kept the house spotless and perfect.

“Barbie. I can’t see your face.” You half-heartedly smiled up at the busty maid. She was standing too close to the bed, and her face was blocked by her protruding breasts.

“Oh! My mistake Miss Harper.” Barbie apologized. However, instead of merely taking a step back, the silly girl tried in vain to squish her big boobs in order to get a better look at you. She stopped upon hearing you sigh once more.

“Just take a step back Barbie.”

“Oh! Right! Silly me!” Barbie took one step back from the bed when her foot stepped down onto a dirty pair of panties you had left lying on the floor. The panties shot out from under her, and Barbie let out an ear-piercing scream as she slipped forward and toppled down onto your bed. She missed your body, all except for her giant breasts crushing your right hand flat as a pancake.

You recoiled in fear of Barbie discovering your secret, sliding your hand out from under her tits and tucking it between your legs. Barbie groaned and stood back up, clearly not noticing what she had done. You breathed a sigh of relief, gratefully that your dumb maid was still in the dark with regards to your squishy nature. You didn’t know it at the time though, but keeping that secret from Barbie was going to be a terrible mistake.

“I’m, like, really really sorry Miss Harper!” Barbie moaned. “I’m such a klutz.”

“It’s fine Barbie. Really.” You soothed her by gently rubbing her shoulder. You sat up and swung your legs out of bed. “Actually Barbie, I wanted to know if there was anything I could help you with today. I’m free all day.”

“Really Miss Harper?” Barbie was astonished. “You want to help me clean the house. Well gee, that’s super-duper nice of you!” The sexy maid giggled like a school girl for a few seconds.

“I don’t have much else to do, and I’d love to feel useful.”

“Well, we should definitely work on something together. Everything is better with friends!” Barbie rubbed her chin thoughtfully. “Um…let’s see…I need to bake a cake for that birthday party at Tina’s tomorrow. Remember? I also needed to vacuum all of the rooms. And then…oh! I need to collect the dirty clothes and do the laundry.”

“That’s quite a hefty list of chores.” You admitted.

“It sure is, but I know we can do it if we work together!” Barbie smiled from ear to ear. “Since you are my boss, you decide! Which chore should we do first?”
It was your turn to think, and you pondered each choice equally. All three had their pros and cons, and each one was equally dangerous. A deep part of you knew that no matter your choice, something terrible was bound to happen to you. Regardless, you still hoped for the best, and finally reached a decision. 13.content:
While you still see Jack as your sweet little boy, your son now has a family of his own. He has a healthy relationship with Mary, who has become his gorgeous and loving wife, and two beautiful teenage daughters, Jill and Patty.

While you felt that living with this illness has been a curse, you couldn't complain about the youth that came with it. Mary had gotten upset on more than one occasion when you were mistaken as her younger sister on your outings with her and her friends, Stacy and Emma. You found it funny, but Mary needed to be constantly assured that her looks weren't fading afterwards. You're glad that Mary and her friends are so willing to spend time with you, especially since your own friends don't have the energy that they used to.

Things had been going so well that you completely forgot about ordering more medication. Even though you no longer need to take care of your son, you still have responsibilities as a grandmother. You've been wanting to take Patty and Jill to the mall for a long time now.
You love both of your granddaughters very much, but you just can't seem to find the time to hang out with them. You admit to favoring Jill over her sister (even though you've found her plastered to your ass every now and then), but you can't seem to shake the feeling that Jack's other daughter, Patty was up to something. She's kind and polite to you and your son, but you're still suspicious...

On top of that, Mary invited you to the beach with her and the others. A trip to the beach in your current state would no doubt be risky, but you don't want to upset her by canceling after you already promised to go.

You also promised to embarrass your son at work. Everyone knew that you were the previous owner of the company and Jack was more than capable of running things, but you felt like he worked too hard. He may be pushing forty, but you're still his mother and you want to make sure that he's doing alright (plus, you find it adorable the way he whines whenever you pester him).

You thought it might be a good idea to try and visit your daughter, Selena. You and her had sadly grown apart over the years, and you're ashamed to admit that it's mostly your fault. You didn't react well to her getting a job at Creed Industries, the company owned by your nemesis, Jacqueline Creed. You wanted the two of your children to run your company together as brother and sister, and the fact that she preferred to work for your enemy stung on an emotional level. The two of you haven't spoken in years, and you haven't even been allowed to see her daughter, Nina. You know that you aren't welcome, but you didn't want to lose your little girl forever.


What are your plans for today?

It had been a long time coming, and another opportunity like this probably wasn’t going to present itself. You changed into a comfy tan leggings and matching tan blouse and headed out the door, making sure to grab your purse as well. You hit the road and drove off to your son’s house.

Once you arrive at the house you decided to stop by inside for a short while, since it had been a few days since you had last seen Mary. Upon entering the home, you were completely oblivious to Jill’s presence, as she had been waiting for you in front of the door. You crushed her flat underneath your flip-flops as you strolled casually into the living room, not noticing a thing.

“Why hello there Trish.” Mary smiled as you entered. She was relaxing on the couch watching a movie with Patty. Patty was curled up in a recliner, her full attention on her cell phone. She didn’t even look up as you walked in.

“Hey Miss Harper.” Patty mumbled. You shook your head and plopped down into the empty recliner across from Mary and Patty. “I wanted to take the girls out to the mall for a day of fun.” You smiled. “Is that okay?”

“Of course! They’ve been looking forward to spending more time with you.” Mary turned to Patty. “Isn’t that right?”

“Huh? Of course.” Patty stood up. “Let me go grab my purse.” She began to leave the room, but chose to exit by crossing in front of Mary. As she did so, she casually bumped the table, causing Jill’s still flattened body to float to the floor. Mary moved her feet to the side to allow Jill to pass, but as soon as Patty left the room, Mary brought her feet back, crushing Jill underneath. Neither Mary nor you noticed.

You talked for several minutes until Patty came back downstairs. She pointed out what had happened to Jill with convincing sincerity, and both Mary and you freaked out. Once everyone had calmed down, Patty said she would take Jill out to the car to give you more time to talk to Mary. The two young girls left the house, and you wrapped up your discussion with Mary after fifteen minutes. Finally, you headed back outside to the car and your waiting granddaughters.

You climbed into the car and plopped down into the driver’s seat. You smiled at Patty and started up the car, assuming Patty had tucked her sister safely into the back seat. After eating breakfast, and changing into a plain white blouse and matching white skirt, you climbed into your car. You were driving off to visit Mary and Jack at college today. You had only been to their campus once or twice before, and another visit had been long overdue. The drive took a little over two hours, so you arrived at about lunch time.

Parking the car, you got out and strolled around the campus for a bit. A few students gave you odd looks, most likely not accustomed to seeing a curvaceous woman happily walking around the campus. Thankfully, none of them had any reason to expect you were actually a squishy and mostly defenseless woman, so you were left alone and safe.

Standing around the middle of the university campus, you took in all of your surroundings. There were several large buildings where the lecture halls and class rooms were contained. Another large building housed the gym and pool. There was a school store, a small pond and nature trail, and a volleyball court by the pond. Students seemed to be everywhere you looked, all enjoying their lunch break.

In the distance, you could see the two giant structures that were the student dorms. One was for males, and the other was for females. You were aware the Jack, due to his special condition, was allowed to live in Mary’s dorm room with her, being the only male in the entire female dormitory. Despite this, Mary still had a dorm mate, though you didn’t know much about her. You recalled her name was Jasmine.

A smaller building was tucked right between the two dormitories, and this building had a big history all to its own. This was the Masterson club house, which was used extensively every Friday through Sunday as a crazy party house. Massive raves were held every weekend in the Masterson house, attended by the majority of the university students. Checking your phone, you realized it was Friday. A party would probably be beginning in an hour or two.

Where do you decide to go next?
143.title: College Life

info.brief_description: The mother of a squishy, gummy boy experiences a similar problem.
info.description:
You are Trish Harper, the mother of a small gummy boy named Jack. Unknown to your son, you've been infected with an odd illness called the Gooey Flu that gives your body the same properties as him. You've had this illness since he was 8, but you're able to hold back the illness thanks to some special medication and live a mostly normal life (well, as normal a life as a woman with a short, malleable son can live, anyway). One day, though, your medication runs out and you have only luck to get you through until you're able to get some more. One plus side to your illness is that you have stopped aging.
In your son's teenage years, you've started a company replicating and selling gummy material and many objects that it's made from using samples of Jack's body mass.
You're pretty overprotective of your son (for obvious reasons), often saving him from situations that you think might even have the possibility of something bad happening. Now that you're vulnerable yourself, can you really look out for both your son and yourself?

[update: 10/24/17] a "prequel" of sorts can be found here: https://aryion.com/g4/view/421215

This story takes place at different stages of your son's life.

secondary characters:

Jack Harper:
(child): Your sweet little moppet of a son. Even taking his condition into account, Jack is truly an odd child. Craving independence, but unsure of himself without being by his mama's side. You'd do anything to protect your boy, even if it means putting yourself in harm's way. His adorable looks have already got him a cute little girlfriend named Mary who will grow to become his wife.
(teenager): Even though Jack is a bit more rebellious, he's still a sweet boy. He now spends most of his time with his girlfriend, with whom you've grown to see as a daughter. He has the occasional outburst every now and then, but he's still a bit of a mama's boy. You've found that the girls at school have become much more aggressive toward your son.
(father): Your son has been married to Mary for several years now, and has two beautiful daughters. Even though he's pushing 40, you still like to tease him every now and then (which embarrasses him to no end). While you get along well with the smaller of his daughters, Jillian, you get the feeling that his other daughter, Patricia (partially named after you) is up to something.

Selena Harper:
(child): Your darling, if somewhat selfish adoptive daughter. She's still very young, and adjusting to her new home, but she still acts as if you're her real mother. She has something of an odd desire to want to get squished, but you try to help her out of her habits. She isn't getting along with your son as well as you'd like, but you reason that all siblings fight. You're confident that they'll grow closer with time. You try not to spoil her, but you want her to be as comfortable living with you as possible, even going so far as to let her keep a pet kitty. It shouldn't hurt to cave to her whining every now and then. She doesn't whine nearly as much when Barbara is around, who seems to know how to get her to behave more than you do.
(teenager): Unlike Jack, Selena has grown normally into a beautiful young woman. Unfortunately, you're beginning to grow distant, and her picking on her brother has gotten even worse, especially when she has her girlfriend over. She still spends time with you, but you usually end up doing things she wants. She doesn't react well to being told she isn't allowed something she wants.
She sometimes gives you the impression that she may know about your condition.
(adult): Among your relationship with your daughter becoming incredibly tense, due to you not reacting well to her taking a job at Creed Industries. You attempt your best to get back on her friendly side, but she doesn't seem to want anything to do with you, even not allowing you to see your grandchild. Hopefully, with Barabra's help, she can find a method to get her back on your side. At least she seems to finally be getting along with Jack.

Barbara Morrison:
Your closest friend since childhood. While the two of you have had your differences in the past, and she may have her faults, but you've always felt like you could rely on Barbara. She's aged quite gracefully compared to most other women and is dedicated to keeping herself fit (though she's gotten a bit flabby). She may be nice at first, but just like you keep your secrets from Jack, she frequently messes with your son behind your back and manages to sweet talk him into keeping quiet about it. Even you've seen the inside of her belly a few times, but only with your consent. She'd never go overboard with you... right?
Somehow, despite how much time passes, she never seems to age.

Tina Evans:
The mother of your son's little girlfriend/future wife. You made quick friends with her after both of your children became close, and you've considered her one of your best friends ever since. She has encouraged you to help Jack become more independent and self-reliant and likes to organize girls night outs with you and Barbara. She's much more outgoing than Barbara and is just generally pleasant to be around. However, she doesn't like it when Jack and Mary are alone (for obvious reasons). She is completely unaware of your condition.

Mary Evans (see the links below for the bios for her other stages of growth):
(child): A cute, affectionate little girl who's taken a liking to your son. She's convinced that she and Jack are meant to be together forever and sometimes gets too carried away when playing with him. She's a little bit pushy, but Jack seems to go along with anything she does.

Jacqueline Creed: The daughter of your ex-boyfriend, Dominic, and the bane of your existence. As the CEO and owner of Creed Industries, she has more money and power at her disposal than any little girl should be allowed. Among the various products that her company produces are your medication, the price of which she's dramatically increased. If you aren't able to pay for them, you're often forced to become her personal plaything until she feels you've worked off your debt. Because her father invested a lot of money into helping start your company, she has a place on the board of directors, giving you even more pressure to keep from failing, lest she remind you of your place in life: either churning in her tummy or squashed beneath her rump.
Regardless of how much time passes, her grudge against you always remains.



For the personalities of other characters, go to the links below.

A Squishy Boy: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1938091-A-Squishy-Boy

A Squishy Teen: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1975029-A-Squishy-Teen

A Squishy Girl: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2038474-A-Squishy-Girl

Rules:
1) Trish cannot die, so don't do it.

2) Be sure to use proper grammar and spelling.

3) Make chapters more than one sentence.

4) Limit the choices. After things get to two paths, it's decision time.

5) NO PLAGIARISM. DO NOT COPY SOMEONE ELSE'S WORK AND PASTE IT IN HERE. DO NOT COPY MY STUFF. (you know who you are)

6) If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors.

7) I'm pretty wishy washy about things involving gas/toilet stuff, so email me your idea if you plan on adding something along those lines.

8) No male interactions in this version of the story.
If you'd like to read or contribute to a version that does have male interactions, go here:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2095283-Malleable-MILF-Anything-Go...
PM me for the passkey
